webauthn.generic: There was an error processing your request. Please try again later
webauthn.timeout: Registration timed out. Please try again.
webauthn.registration_failed: Could not register because of a server error. Please try again.
webauthn.delete_failed: Could not delete the authentificator. Please try again.

totp.name: Timed password (TOTP)
totp.howTo: Scan the code using your Esup Auth app or Google Authenticator app or enter the code directly into your TOTP application
totp.howToActivate: Then, to validate the TOTP activation, enter below the 6-digit code displayed on your application

random_code.name: One time password
random_code.description: Method to generate random codes valid for some time

sms.title: Code received by SMS
sms.pre: A code has been sent to you by SMS to the number <strong>
sms.post:
.
Please enter the code received to validate this number

mail.title: Code received by email
mail.pre: A code has been sent to you by email to the address <strong>
mail.post:
.
Please enter the code received to validate this email address

random_code_mail.name: One time password by mail
random_code_mail.description: Method to generate random codes and sent it by mail

bypass.name: Backup codes
bypass.description: Method for generating a random codes list
bypass.note: These codes can only be used once. Once generated, print them out and store them in a safe place. You will not be able to retrieve them later. You can generate new codes at any time, but the previous ones will then be invalidated.

passcode_grid.name: Passcode grid
passcode_grid.description: Method for generating a grid of random codes
passcode_grid.note:
Do not photograph. Do not share.
In case of loss, contact the DSIUN.

matrix.name: Authentication Grid
matrix.description: Method to connect via a grid

push.name: Notification (Esup Auth)
push.description: Method for connecting via smartphone notifications with Esup Auth
push.push_confirmation1: Please scan this code in the smartphone application
push.push_confirmation2: If your smartphone does not have a functional picture appreil or you are having difficulties to scan the code above. Go to the menu "Settings " then click "Activate without scan ".

esupnfc.name: EsupNFC
esupnfc.description: Method for connecting via NFC swipe

webauthn.name: Hardware authenticator (WebAuthn)
webauthn.description: WebAuthn hardware authentication factor (Smartphone, Windows Hello, TouchID, ...).
webauthn.no_authentificators: You have no authentificators registered. Register one?

home.description: ESUP-OTP permits you to add a second level of protection to your account. You can, for example, set a single-use code sent to you by SMS in addition to your username and password. Thus, a third can not access your account with the same password.
home.totp: TOTP code into an application (Esup Auth, Authenticator...).
home.esupnfc: Connection with student card or business card
home.webauthn: WebAuthn hardware authentication factor (Smartphone, Windows Hello, TouchID, ...).
home.note: Set up at least 2 methods among:

action.confirm_generate: Old codes will be erased. Continue?

webauthn.confirm_delete: Do you really want to delete %NAME%?
